pullRequest.body:
This PR extends the API around `WithAbs` by adding more instances, the algebra equivalence `WithAbs.algEquiv` and a rewriting lemma norm --> absolute value.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> List.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
### PR summary [784e0b98d5](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/20642/commits/784e0b98d57f3649025a4891d7623ed42b61acb8)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ algEquiv`
`+ instAlgebra_left`
`+ instAlgebra_right`
`+ instCommRing`
`+ instCommSemiring`
`+ instModule_left`
`+ instModule_right`
`+ instNontrivial`
`+ norm_eq_abv`
`- instNonTrivial`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

I'm thinking of making `WithAbs.equiv` a ring equivalence (i.e., replacing it by `WithAbs.ringEquiv`); this should allow to get rid of most of the API lemmas for `WithAbs.equiv` (as the standard ring hom lemmas can be used); see [#20713](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/20713).

So maybe that one should be merged first, before adding `Module` and `Algebra` instances etc.

The diff looks worse than it is, because I have moved things around somewhat (to avoid the problem discussed [here](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/channel/287929-mathlib4/topic/Instance.20diamond.20in.20algebra.20hierarchy.3F/near/493385245)). Here is a summary:
* change '"Use map_xxx"' in the deprecations to 'map_xxx'
* add a bunch of further instances on `WithAbs v`, in particular `Module` and `Algebra`
* add the canonical `AlgEquiv` from `WithAbs v` to `R'` when `R'` is an `R`-algebra
* add a rewriting lemma `norm_eq_abv`
* more consistent naming of arguments
* general target `S` of `AbsoluteValue` wherever possible

(some of this reverts/improves changes from [#20713](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/20713)).

Thanks for the further explanation! I agree that this PR does much less than the diff suggests :-)

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/13249923424/job/36985207749)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/13249923424/job/36985207369)

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat/chore(Analysis/Normed/Ring/WithAbs): extend API for WithAbs
